title: Diagnose why QuarkusProdModeTest are sometimes stuck

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
See this PR for instance: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/41860

Stuck test:
```
2024-07-13T09:54:13.1453310Z [INFO] Running io.quarkus.resteasy.reactive.links.deployment.HalLinksWithJsonbTest
2024-07-13T09:54:15.3045873Z 2024-07-13 09:54:15,283 INFO  [io.qua.dep.QuarkusAugmentor] (main) Quarkus augmentation completed in 1462ms
2024-07-13T09:54:16.0998900Z __  ____  __  _____   ___  __ ____  ______ 
2024-07-13T09:54:16.1000486Z  --/ __ \/ / / / _ | / _ \/ //_/ / / / __/ 
2024-07-13T09:54:16.1001744Z  -/ /_/ / /_/ / __ |/ , _/ ,< / /_/ /\ \   
2024-07-13T09:54:16.1002754Z --\___\_\____/_/ |_/_/|_/_/|_|\____/___/   
2024-07-13T09:54:16.1003794Z             Powered by Quarkus 999-SNAPSHOT
2024-07-13T09:54:16.1006253Z 2024-07-13 09:54:16,085 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) quarkus-rest-links-deployment 999-SNAPSHOT on JVM (powered by Quarkus 999-SNAPSHOT) started in 0.751s. Listening on: http://0.0.0.0:8081
2024-07-13T09:54:16.1010179Z 2024-07-13 09:54:16,091 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) Profile prod activated. 
2024-07-13T09:54:16.1012119Z 2024-07-13 09:54:16,091 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) Installed features: [cdi, rest, rest-jsonb, rest-links, smallrye-context-propagation, vertx]
```

Thread dump (but that's not really the one of interest, unfortunately, we need to improve `QuarkusProdModeTest` shutdown sequence):

